div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 234 Tricca (Trikkala) environs, Thessaly, 1961 Burial: c. 168 B.C. (T) Contents: 100-150 AR Philip V: 2 tetradr. Perseus: 30+ tetradr. Thasos: some spread-flan tetradr. (early) Athens: c. 100 New Style tetradr. (to 169 B.C.) Disposition: dispersed. Münz. u. Med. Nov. 17, 1962, 444 and F.P.L. May, 1962, 12. Cf. Kress Oct. 4, 1962, 116 Varoucha, BCH 1962, p. 422, no. 9 (in all probability part of this hd.) † Thompson, ANSMN 11 (1964), pp. 77-80, illus.
